properties.title: Donating money to the JGroups Project

section.name: Contributing Money to JGroups
section.p: JGroups is currently run on the side (nights and weekends) since I'm a full-time employee. This leaves me with less time than I wish I had to spend on the project.
Therefore, if you like JGroups and would like to contribute money to it, please press the PayPal button below and donate some money to the project.

This will allow me to take some unpaid time off every now and then and work full-time on JGroups, e.g. fixing bugs, implementing new features etc. Please contact me if you prefer other methods of payment.

input.name: submit
input.alt: Make payments with PayPal - it's fast, free and secure!
